quotes.quote: It is true that I was born in Iowa, but I can't speak for my twin sister.
quotes.author: Abigail Van Buren

quotes.quote: Some people are born on third base and go through life thinking they hit a triple.
quotes.author: Barry Switzer

quotes.quote: He not busy being born is busy dying.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: There is no cure for birth and death save to enjoy the interval.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: When I was born I was so surprised I didn't talk for a year and a half.
quotes.author: Gracie Allen

quotes.quote: We are born charming, fresh and spontaneous and must be civilized before we are fit to participate in society.
quotes.author: Judith Martin

quotes.quote: Somewhere on this globe, every ten seconds, there is a woman giving birth to a child. She must be found and stopped.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: To my embarrassment I was born in bed with a lady.
quotes.author: Wilson Mizner
